scripts.deploy-local: yarn deploy-auth-and-claim && yarn deploy-simple-auth && yarn deploy-simple-claim && yarn deploy-two-auths-and-claim && yarn generate-abi
scripts.deploy-auth-and-claim: forge script DeployAuthAndClaim --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 -vv --mnemonics 'test test test test test test test test test test test junk' --sender '0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266' --broadcast
scripts.deploy-simple-auth: forge script DeploySimpleAuth --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 -vv --mnemonics 'test test test test test test test test test test test junk' --sender '0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266' --broadcast
scripts.deploy-simple-claim: forge script DeploySimpleClaim --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 -vv --mnemonics 'test test test test test test test test test test test junk' --sender '0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266' --broadcast
scripts.deploy-two-auths-and-claim: forge script DeployTwoAuthsAndClaim --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 -vv --mnemonics 'test test test test test test test test test test test junk' --sender '0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266' --broadcast
